Contribute

If you want contribute to #ngTasty you can share some of your components, services or filters and make it available for the entire AngularJS community.

Installing Yeoman

npm install -g yo

Installing generator-ngtasty

npm install generator-ngtasty

Scaffolding out your ngTasty componentâ€™s pieces

yo ngTasty:component myComponent
yo ngTasty:filter myFilter
yo ngTasty:service myService
